sentence.Network_en: Why had Hilton defended him so ardently?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么希尔顿如此激动地为他辩护呢？

sentence.Network_en: His reports are often ardently pro-Russian.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的报告常常是力挺俄罗斯的。

sentence.Network_en: He set himself ferociously tough standards; and he was ardently devoted to ballet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给自己制定了极为苛刻的标准，满腔热忱地献身于芭蕾事业。

entry.def: Ardent is used to describe someone who has extremely strong feelings about something or someone.

example.ex: He's been one of the most ardent supporters of the administration's policy.
example.tran: 他一向是政府政策最热情的支持者之一。

example.ex: ...an ardent opponent of the Vietnam War.
example.tran: 越南战争的强烈反对者

sentences.sentence: "the spirit of God knew very well that there was a deeper question to be settled before there could be the intervention in power that was so ardently desired"

auth_sentence.content: The most ardently Islamist candidates were excluded.
